title: "Example"
author: "Roc Alabern"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(knitr)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(radarWidget)

n = 3
d = 8
df = data.frame(Label = letters[1:n])
for (i in 1:d) df[, paste0("Eje_",i)] = runif(n)
df = df[, c(colnames(df)[1], colnames(df)[2], rev(colnames(df)[3:(d+1)]))]

radarWidget(df)
```
